title: App transfer from iphone7 to Pixel 5 is not working
content:
I have tried twice to reset the Pixel following all the instructions from google and forums.

Using the cable with adapter, I connect new Pixel 5 to old iPhone7, after turning off iMessage and Face time and location services on the iPhone.

I go through the various prompts and it takes a while to copy the data.

BUT it does copy my google account (that is managed by a Brand Account that I myself own and manage) but NOT A SINGLE APP IS PASSED FROM THE IPHONE.

I mean banking apps, meteo apps, photography, FREE APPS... but not a single one is passed...

I have been looking all over the place but cannot find anywhere how to copy FREE apps.

The phone is ONLINE and with a SIM card with unlimited data... but it is not downloading any app or anything... it says set up COMPLETE.

ANY CLUES?

THANKS

GIORGIO
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
